name: NeonGalaxy Wars
description:
NeonGalaxy Wars is a game with bright effects and unusual game elements, into which you will play and replay. It takes place in a huge space that has become a place for a large-scale battle. Your task is to free the galaxy from the brutal dictatorship of the invaders. On the way to victory you expect a variety of enemies, everything will depend on your skill, prove your superiority!

★ Stunning Neon Style
★ Driving music
★ Several kinds of opponents
★ Endless Journey
★ Affordable, minimum price
★ Controls: WASD control of the ship and mouse for shooting

We wish you happiness! And success!
